input.message: 这些女生中有多少人姓陈？分别叫什么？

intent_result.merged_query: 查询22级计科专业女生中姓陈的学生人数及姓名
intent_result.rewritten_query: 查询22级计科专业女生中姓陈的学生人数及姓名

sql_result.sql: WITH base AS (SELECT student.real_name FROM student JOIN major ON student.major_id = major.id WHERE student.enroll_year = 2022 AND major.major_name = '计算机科学与技术' AND student.gender = '女' AND student.real_name LIKE '陈%' AND student.is_deleted = 0 AND major.is_deleted = 0) SELECT COUNT(*) AS count, GROUP_CONCAT(base.real_name ORDER BY base.real_name) AS real_name FROM base

entity_mappings.reason: 根据字段描述“入学年份（常见问法：22级）”映射
根据字段描述“专业名称”及常见简称“计科”对应全称“计算机科学与技术”
根据字段描述“性别（男/女等）”映射
根据字段描述“学生姓名”使用前缀匹配 '陈%'

sql_validate_result.executed_sql: WITH base AS (SELECT student.real_name FROM student JOIN major ON student.major_id = major.id WHERE student.enroll_year = 2022 AND major.major_name = '计算机科学与技术' AND student.gender = '女' AND student.real_name LIKE '陈%' AND student.is_deleted = 0 AND major.is_deleted = 0) SELECT COUNT(*) AS count, GROUP_CONCAT(base.real_name ORDER BY base.real_name) AS real_name FROM base

output.merged_query: 查询22级计科专业女生中姓陈的学生人数及姓名
